subject: Re: [junit] Question on assertEquals()
msgSnippet: ... Submit it to JUnit-addons. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.info Your guide to software craftsmanship JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for
messageBody:
David Jackman wrote:
> I have written some JUnit enhancements (for 3.8) that will assert
> arrays, collections, and maps (including ordered and unordered
> assertions and subsets). It isn't anywhere public right now, but I'll
> freely give it to anyone that wants it (especially if it can find its
> way into JUnit main libraries, which really ought to have this stuff
> already).

Submit it to JUnit-addons.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.info
Your guide to software craftsmanship
JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
2005 Gordon Pask Award for contribution Agile Software Practice
